description: This course introduces the religious and philosophical traditions of China, Korea, and Japan:
Confucianism, Chinese Taoism, Buddhism, Japanese Shinto, and the folk traditions. Students read
classical texts such as Confucius' Analects, Zhuangzi, Taodejing, and Chan Buddhist texts, and
such as Tao, yin/yang, and humaneness. Offered periodically.
fullname: Religions of China, Korea, and Japan
